name: Loose Bolts
description:
Loose Bolts is a casual racing game with accessible controls, cute cars and quirky handicaps.

Current content
In this early stage of development, the game only contains a time trial mode with 1 car on 1 track. The next update will include at least 1 more car, local multiplayer, and some handicaps to even the playing field.

Handicaps
Handicaps are things that affect a single player to provide a fun extra challenge. Examples of handicaps to come are:

  • Inverted steering
  • Explosives on board
  • Top heavy car
  • Driving backwards
  • You can only steer when your feet are off the pedals
